    public class CustomSOS
extends de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.NumberVector,de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.outlier.OutlierResult>
implements de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.OutlierAlgorithm, ELKIAlgorithm<de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.NumberVector>
    Stochastic Outlier Selection.

    Reference:

    J. Janssens, F. Huszár, E. Postma, J. van den Herik
    Stochastic Outlier Selection
    TiCC TR 2012–001

    Since:
    0.7.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

        public static double sumOfProbabilities(de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.DBIDIter ignore,
                        de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.DBIDArrayIter di,
                        double[] p)
        Compute the sum of probabilities, stop at first 0, ignore query object. Note: while SOS ensures the 'ignore' object is not added in the first place, KNNSOS cannot do so efficiently (yet).
        Parameters:
        ignore - Object to ignore.
        di - Object list
        p - Probabilities
        Returns:
        Sum.

        Parameters:

        di - Neighbor object IDs.
        p - Probabilities

      • computePi

               double[] p,
               double perplexity,
               double logPerp)
        Compute row p[i], using binary search on the kernel bandwidth sigma to obtain the desired perplexity.

        it - Distances iterator
        p - Output row
        perplexity - Desired perplexity
        logPerp - Log of desired perplexity
